definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 132:18 consecration, crown, Naziriteship;—´[[נ]] abs. 2Sa 1:10 +; cstr. Ex 29:6 +; sf. [[נִזֵרוֹ]] Ps 89:40 +, [[נִזְרֵךְ]] Je 7:29; —
crown (sign of consecration; We:Skizzeu iii. 118 cp. Syr. [[קדשא]] [qdo4o0], earring; v. also Gei:Jüd. Zeitschr. x. 45 ff. on [[נֶזֶם]]):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of kg. 2 S 2Sa 1:10, 2Ki 11:12 = 2Ch 23:11; symbol of royal power Ps 89:40, Ps 132:18; cf. Pr 27:24; ´[[אַבְּנֵי נ]] Zec 9:16 stones of a crown, diadem (prob.; > We Now—who del., cf. GASm—stones of charming, fr. use of precious stones as charms.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of high priest, [[הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[נ]] Ex 29:6, made of gold Ex 39:30 Le 8:9 (all P).

woman's hair (orig. prob. of long hair as sign of consecration, as in Nazirite vow, cf. Nu 6:19 infr., and [[נׇזַיר]] also We:Sklzzen iii. 117, 107; Arab. Heidenthum 2, p. l43 RS:Sem. i. 464. 2d ed. 483), Je 7:29 (of personif. Jerus.).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of h. p. [[עליו]] ´[[שֶׁמֶן מִשְׁחַת א]] ´[[נ]] Le 21:12 (P) the consecration of the oil of anointing of his God is upon him.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in Nu 6 (P), specif. of Nazirite consecration (cf. [[נׇזִיר]]) : [[אֱלֽהָיו עָלָיו]] ´[[נ]] Nu 6:7, [[נֶדֶר נִזְרוֹ]] v:Nu 6:5, ´[[טָמֵא נ]] v:Nu 6:12, ´[[ראׁשׁ נ]] (because of unshorn hair) v:Nu 6:9, v:Nu 6:18, v:Nu 6:18, ´[[יְמֵי נ]] ([[כָּל־]]) v:Nu 6:4, v:Nu 6:8, v:Nu 6:12, v:Nu 6:13 ´[[תּוֹרַת נ]] v:Nu 6:21 b cf. ´[[עַל־נ]] v:Nu 6:21; in v:Nu 6:19 ´[[נ]] = the hair of his consecration (cf. Je 7:29 supr.).
